description: Details of enhanced sound insulation of at least 10/15dB (as necessary) above the Building Regulations value for residential use, for the floor/ceiling/walls separating the commercial premises from dwellings in pursuant to condition 12 of planning permission 215780FUL dated 17/12/2021 for Redevelopment of site to create 8no. self-contained flats and central courtyard at first floor level; construction of second floor with habitable roof space to front of building; construction of two additional floors to rear of building; first floor rear extension; installation of 4no. rooflights to front roof slope; and provision of associated balconies, terraces, cycle and refuse storage.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
